word: Notwithstanding the warnings in the Word of God and in the testimonies of His Spirit, many have closed their eyes to danger and have gone on in their own way, infatuated, deluded by Satan until they fall under his temptations.  Then they abandon themselves to despair. This was the history of Solomon.  But even for him there was help.  He truly repented of his course of sin, and found help.
